sources.name: ADONETSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		Var_LinkFlag as string,
		CAPACITYVARIANCE as string,
		Org_ID as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		VPC_ID as string,
		PLANT as string,
		CUSTOMER_ID as string,
		INTRANSIT_UNASSIGNED as string,
		INTRANSIT_ASSIGNED as string,
		INTRANSIT_PAST_UNASSIGNED as string,
		INTRANSIT_PAST_ASSIGNED as string,
		GROUND_UNASSIGNED as string,
		GROUND_ASSIGNED_ON_HOLD as string,
		GROUND_ASSIGNED as string,
		TRANSPORT_TYPE as string,
		CREATED_DATE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		MODIFIED_DATE as string,
		MODIFIED_BY as string,
		UNASSIGNED_TOTAL as string,
		UNASSIGNED_TOTAL_TRANS_TYPE as string,
		ASSIGNED_SHIPPABLE as string,
		UNSHIPPABLE_TOTAL as string,
		CAPACITY_VARIANCE as string,
		SIT_ON_GROUND as string,
		INVENTORY_TOTAL_TRANS_TYPE as string,
		UNSHIPPABLE_CAPACITY as string,
		PCT_UNSHIPPABLE_CAPACITY as string,
		AIRPORT_INVENTORY as string,
		MAKE_ID as string,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY as string,
		RAIL_CAPACITY as string,
		TRUCK_ASSIGN_REQD_TO_SHIP as string,
		RAIL_ASSIGN_REQD_TO_SHIP as string,
		OCEAN_ASSIGN_REQD_TO_SHIP as string,
		CUSTOMER as string,
		LOCATION_ID as string,
		VPC as string,
		Brand as string,
		Var_LinkDate as string,
		Var_LinkFlag as string,
		CAPACITYVARIANCE as string,
		Org_ID as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		VPC_ID as string,
		PLANT as string,
		CUSTOMER_ID as string,
		INTRANSIT_UNASSIGNED as string,
		INTRANSIT_ASSIGNED as string,
		INTRANSIT_PAST_UNASSIGNED as string,
		INTRANSIT_PAST_ASSIGNED as string,
		GROUND_UNASSIGNED as string,
		GROUND_ASSIGNED_ON_HOLD as string,
		GROUND_ASSIGNED as string,
		TRANSPORT_TYPE as string,
		CREATED_DATE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		MODIFIED_DATE as string,
		MODIFIED_BY as string,
		UNASSIGNED_TOTAL as string,
		UNASSIGNED_TOTAL_TRANS_TYPE as string,
		ASSIGNED_SHIPPABLE as string,
		UNSHIPPABLE_TOTAL as string,
		CAPACITY_VARIANCE as string,
		SIT_ON_GROUND as string,
		INVENTORY_TOTAL_TRANS_TYPE as string,
		UNSHIPPABLE_CAPACITY as string,
		PCT_UNSHIPPABLE_CAPACITY as string,
		AIRPORT_INVENTORY as string,
		MAKE_ID as string,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY as string,
		RAIL_CAPACITY as string,
		TRUCK_ASSIGN_REQD_TO_SHIP as string,
		RAIL_ASSIGN_REQD_TO_SHIP as string,
		OCEAN_ASSIGN_REQD_TO_SHIP as string,
		CUSTOMER as string,
		LOCATION_ID as string,
		VPC as string,
		Brand as string,
		Var_LinkDate as string,
		ErrorCode as integer,
		ErrorColumn as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ADONETSource

sinks.name: ADONETDestination
sinks.script:
ADONETSource sink(mapColumn(
		Var_LinkFlag,
		CAPACITYVARIANCE,
		Org_ID,
		CUST_ID,
		VPC_ID,
		PLANT,
		CUSTOMER_ID,
		INTRANSIT_UNASSIGNED,
		INTRANSIT_ASSIGNED,
		INTRANSIT_PAST_UNASSIGNED,
		INTRANSIT_PAST_ASSIGNED,
		GROUND_UNASSIGNED,
		GROUND_ASSIGNED_ON_HOLD,
		GROUND_ASSIGNED,
		TRANSPORT_TYPE,
		CREATED_DATE,
		CREATED_BY,
		MODIFIED_DATE,
		MODIFIED_BY,
		UNASSIGNED_TOTAL,
		UNASSIGNED_TOTAL_TRANS_TYPE,
		ASSIGNED_SHIPPABLE,
		UNSHIPPABLE_TOTAL,
		CAPACITY_VARIANCE,
		SIT_ON_GROUND,
		INVENTORY_TOTAL_TRANS_TYPE,
		UNSHIPPABLE_CAPACITY,
		PCT_UNSHIPPABLE_CAPACITY,
		AIRPORT_INVENTORY,
		MAKE_ID,
		TRUCK_CAPACITY,
		RAIL_CAPACITY,
		TRUCK_ASSIGN_REQD_TO_SHIP,
		RAIL_ASSIGN_REQD_TO_SHIP,
		OCEAN_ASSIGN_REQD_TO_SHIP,
		CUSTOMER,
		LOCATION_ID,
		VPC,
		Brand,
		Var_LinkDate
	)) ~> ADONETDestination
